summary: Implements a Flax-based pre‑trained multilingual sequence‑to‑sequence model, handling weight initialization, cache setup, and separate encoder and decoder forward passes, as well as high‑level encode and decode operations.
business_intent: Enable developers to leverage a ready‑to‑use multilingual translation and generation model within JAX/Flax applications, reducing the effort required to train or fine‑tune MBart from scratch.
